seo.title: Garmin Approach® S12 | Golf Watch
seo.ogDescription: Garmin Approach® S12 lets you keep it simple on the course. Features include 42,000 CourseView maps, live score & course updates when paired with Garmin Golf app.

overviewTab.title: Overview

specsTab.title: Specs
specsTab.content:
What You'll Love
Watch display typeSunlight-visible, transflective memory-in-pixel (MIP)
Water rating 5 ATM

General
Strap materialSilicone
Quick Release bands
Physical size43.7 x 43.7 x 11.5 mm
Fits wrists with a circumference of 125-202 mm
Weight1.20 oz (34.1 g)
Display Size0.9″ x 0.9″ (23 x 23 mm)
Display Resolution175 x 175 pixels
Battery lifeWatch mode: Up to 10 weeks
GPS mode: Up to 30 hours
Charging methodGarmin proprietary plug charger
Memory/History125 MB

Clock Features
Time/date
GPS Time Sync
Automatic daylight saving time
Sunrise/sunset times

Sensors
GPS

Daily Smart Features
ConnectivityBluetooth® Smart
Smartphone compatibilityiPhone®, Android™

Activity profiles
Outdoor recreationGolfing

Golfing Features
Preloaded with 43,000 courses worldwide
Yardage to F/M/B (distance to front, middle and back of green)
Yardage to layups/doglegs
Measures shot distance (calculates exact yardage for shots from anywhere on course)Manual
DIGITAL SCORECARD
Stat tracking (strokes, putts per round, greens and fairways hit)
Auto CourseView updates
GREEN VIEW WITH MANUAL PIN POSITION
Hazards and course targets
Round timer/odometer
Automatic club tracking compatible (requires accessory)
Pairs with Garmin Golf app
Tournament legal

010-02472-01.shippingDisclaimer: Ready to ship in 1–3 business days.

ITFE_PRODUCT_PAGES_MAP_TAB_TRANSLATIONS.ITFE_PRODUCT_PAGES_MAP_TAB_HEADING: Find compatible maps for the best navigation experience. To update the maps that came with your device, you can {{link}}.

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.
